comment: It's been since the House passed their sham Articles of Impeachment . Yet , Speaker Pelosi is still refusing to transmit the articles to the Senate because she knows that House Democrats fundamentally failed to make their case .
amr:
# ::snt It's been since the House passed their sham Articles of Impeachment . Yet , Speaker Pelosi is still refusing to transmit the articles to the Senate because she knows that House Democrats fundamentally failed to make their case .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / pass-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "House"))
            :ARG1 (a / article
                  :topic (ii / impeach-01)

                  :poss g)
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (n2 / now)))
      :snt2 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (r / refuse-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Pelosi")
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (s2 / speaker)))
                  :ARG1 (t / transmit-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (a2 / article)
                        :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Senate")))
                  :mod (y / yet)
                  :mod (s3 / still)
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (k / know-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (f / fail-01
                                    :ARG1 p2
                                    :ARG0-of h2
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / political-party
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Democratic"
                                                :op2 "Party"))))
                        :ARG2 (c2 / case-03
                              :ARG0 p2)
                        :manner (f2 / fundamental)))))

comment: No they made their case . You guys complain that Democrats are doing this impeachment because they cant beat at the ballot box . So it is an election year and is just holding off to see if Trump gets reelected ...
